subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic, who beat Stanislas Wawrinka, will face Rafael Nadal, who beat Richard Gasquet, in the United States Open men’s final, the 37th episode of their long-running miniseries.
snippet: Novak Djokovic, who beat Stanislas Wawrinka, will face Rafael Nadal, who beat Richard Gasquet, in the United States Open men’s final, the 37th episode of their long-running miniseries.
